paragraphs.title: Lesson 8
paragraphs.text:
In this lesson you will be querying the MapR-DB replicated table using Apache Drill in this Apache Zeppelin notebook.

The notebook consists out of a number of queries that reflect business questions about the classified image. The initial query constructs a Apache Drill view that is referenced in later parts of this notebook so therefore, it is important to perform that query first before continuing with the other queries.

paragraphs.title: Create a View for querying the classified data
paragraphs.text:
%drill
Create or Replace View 
    dfs.root.`/remote-image-classification/remote-image-output-table_view` as select
    *
    from
    (
    select
    Image
    , Cast(`Year` as Decimal(4,0)) as `Year`
    , Cast(`Month` as Decimal(2,0)) as `Month`
    , Cast(`Day` as Decimal(2,0)) as `Day`
    , Cast(`HourMinute` as Decimal(4,0)) as `HourMinute`
    , Cast(`Hour` as Decimal(2,0)) as `Hour`
    , Cast(`Minute` as Decimal(2,0)) as `Minute`
    , Cast(Concat(`Hour`, ':', `Minute`, ':', '00') as Time) as `Time`
    , Label
    , Confidence
    , TopLeftX
    , TopLeftY
    , BottomRightX
    , BottomRightY
    , 1 as Counter
    from
        (select 
        t.Image as Image
        , SUBSTR(t.Image, 8, 4) `Year`
        , SUBSTR(t.Image, 12, 2) `Month`
        , SUBSTR(t.Image, 14, 2) `Day`
        , SUBSTR(t.Image, 17, 4) `HourMinute`
        , SUBSTR(t.Image, 17, 2) `Hour`
        , SUBSTR(t.Image, 19, 2) `Minute`
        , SUBSTR(t.Image, 17, 6) `Time`
        , t.objects.label Label
        , t.objects.confidence Confidence
        , t.objects.topleft.x TopLeftX
        , t.objects.topleft.y TopLeftY
        , t.objects.bottomright.x BottomRightX
        , t.objects.bottomright.y BottomRightY 
    from (select _Id as Image, flatten(objects) as objects from dfs.root.`/output/database/image-output-table`) t))

paragraphs.title: Count the total number of objects in the dataset.
paragraphs.text:
%drill
select count(Distinct Image) as `Files`,  sum(Counter) as `Objects` from dfs.root.`/remote-image-classification/remote-image-output-table_view`

paragraphs.title: Which are the Top 5 objects that have been classified?
paragraphs.text:
%drill
select Label, sum(counter) Number from dfs.root.`/remote-image-classification/remote-image-output-table_view` group by Label order by 2 desc Limit 5

paragraphs.title: What are the Top 3 images with the most objects classified
paragraphs.text:
%drill
select  Image, sum(counter) Number from dfs.root.`/remote-image-classification/remote-image-output-table_view` group by Image order by 2 desc LIMIT 3

paragraphs.title: What are the Labels for the Top 5 images with the most objects classified?
paragraphs.text:
%drill
select Label, sum(`Number`) as `Number` from
  (select Image, Label, sum(Counter) as `Number` from  dfs.root.`/remote-image-classification/remote-image-output-table_view` 
   where Image in 
    (select Image from  
      (select Image, sum(Counter) from dfs.root.`/remote-image-classification/remote-image-output-table_view` 
      Group by Image Order By 2 Desc limit 5) 
    ) group by Image, Label)
Group by Label Order By `Number` Desc

paragraphs.title: What is the image with the least classified objects? When was it taken? And what are the objects identified for this image?
paragraphs.text:
%drill
select Image,`Time`, Label, sum(Counter) as `Number` from  dfs.root.`/remote-image-classification/remote-image-output-table_view` 
where Image in
    (select Image from 
        (select Image, sum(Counter) Number from dfs.root.`/remote-image-classification/remote-image-output-table_view` group by Image order by 2 asc LIMIT 1))
Group By Image, `Time`, Label Order By 4 Desc

paragraphs.title: What is  the spread of the number of images classified per hour?
paragraphs.text:
%drill
select distinct(Image), `Hour`, count(Distinct Image) as `Number` from dfs.root.`/remote-image-classification/remote-image-output-table_view`  group by Image, `Hour` order by 1 Asc

paragraphs.title: What is the spread of people in the room over time?
paragraphs.text:
%drill
select  distinct(`Time`), count(Label) as `Total` from dfs.root.`/remote-image-classification/remote-image-output-table_view` Where Label = 'person' group by `Time` order by 1 asc

paragraphs.title: Identify images that could be incorrectly classified and use the global namespace to identify the image on the remote cluster - Part 1
paragraphs.text:
%drill
select Label, sum(counter) Number from dfs.root.`/remote-image-classification/remote-image-output-table_view` group by Label order by 2 desc

paragraphs.title: Identify images that could be incorrectly classified and use the global namespace to identify the image on the remote cluster - Part 2
paragraphs.text:
%drill
select Image, Label from dfs.root.`/remote-image-classification/remote-image-output-table_view` where Label = 'dog'
